response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its immense value to you, I am confident it will be a game-changer. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $10,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while maximizing your investment. Please let me know if you wish to proceed with this opportunity. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 10000}
